database.name: VIEW EFIN_ACC_BUDGET_INQUIRY_V
database.view: SELECT bl.efin_budgetlines_id AS efin_acc_budget_inquiry_v_id, bl.ad_client_id, bl.ad_org_id, bl.isactive, bl.created, bl.createdby, bl.updated, bl.updatedby, 'originalbudget' AS transfertype, pr.name AS period, pr.startdate AS accountdate, pr.startdate AS transferdate, '' AS revisionno, bl.amount AS dr, 0.00 AS cr, bl.amount - 0.00 AS net, '' AS description FROM efin_budgetlines bl JOIN efin_budget bh ON bh.efin_budget_id = bl.efin_budget_id JOIN c_period pr ON pr.c_period_id = bh.frmperiod UNION SELECT ebl.efin_budgetlines_id AS efin_acc_budget_inquiry_v_id, ebl.ad_client_id, ebl.ad_org_id, ebl.isactive, ebl.created, ebl.createdby, ebl.updated, ebl.updatedby, tr.transfer AS transfertype, pre.name AS period, tr.act_date AS accountdate, tr.trxdate AS transferdate, trx.documentno AS revisionno, tr.amount AS dr, tr.dec_amount AS cr, tr.amount - tr.dec_amount AS net, tr.description FROM efin_budget_transfer tr JOIN efin_budgetlines ebl ON ebl.efin_budgetlines_id = tr.efin_budgetlines_id JOIN efin_budget_transfertrx trx ON trx.efin_budget_transfertrx_id = tr.efin_budget_transfertrx_id JOIN efin_budget eb ON eb.efin_budget_id = ebl.efin_budget_id JOIN c_period pre ON pre.c_year_id = eb.c_year_id WHERE tr.act_date >= pre.startdate AND tr.act_date <= pre.enddate
